name: DreamWeb
overview: The protagonist and anti-hero is Ryan, a bartender in a futuristic dystopian city who has been plagued by strange dreams of an entity known as the Dreamweb. In the dream that opens the game, Ryan is asked by the master monk of the Keepers to be the deliverer and kill the seven evils, who are united to break the Dreamweb and send mankind spiraling into chaos.
